anywhere.translation[0].definitions[0].e: You can buy clothes like these anywhere.
I don’t want to live in London, but I’d be happy living anywhere else.
anywhere.translation[0].definitions[1].e: Do you need anywhere to stay for the night?
Did you go anywhere exotic on vacation this year?
Have you been anywhere else in Spain?
anywhere.translation[0].definitions[2].d: used in negative sentences to mean no place
anywhere.translation[0].definitions[2].e: I can’t find my passport anywhere.
